example: The muscle helps with movement.
example_german: Der Muskel hilft bei der Bewegung.

example: The dog chews the bone.
The skin protects our body.
The heart pumps blood in the body.
example_german: Das Herz pumpt Blut im Körper.

example: The lung helps us breathe air.
example_german: Die Lunge hilft uns, Luft zu atmen.

example: The neck is very important.
My shoulders feel tense after work.
example_german: Meine Schultern fühlen sich nach der Arbeit angespannt an.

example: The chest is very strong.
He measured his waist size carefully.
My belly is full after lunch.
example_german: Mein Bauch ist nach dem Mittagessen voll.

example: I hurt my knee yesterday.
example_german: Gestern habe ich mir das Knie verletzt.

example: I twisted my ankle yesterday.
example_german: Ich habe mir gestern den Knöchel verstaucht.

example: I bumped my elbow on the table.
example_german: Ich habe meinen Ellbogen am Tisch gestoßen.

example: The doll is very pretty.
He maintains a correct posture.
She gave him a quick glance.
example_german: Sie warf ihm einen schnellen Blick zu.

example: They resemble each other closely.
She has fair skin.
He has dark skin.
I have sensitive skin.
She has soft skin.
She is tanned from the beach.
The wall is white.
She is dark-haired and friendly.
He is good-looking and very kind.
example_german: Er sieht gut aus und ist sehr nett.

example: She looks bad today.
She has a good figure.
He thinks he has a bad figure.
example_german: Er denkt, dass er eine schlechte Figur hat.

example: He has good style in fashion.
example_german: Er hat einen guten Stil in der Mode.

example: He has bad style in his clothes.
example_german: Er hat einen schlechten Stil in seiner Kleidung.

example: He has a good presence at work.
example_german: Er hat eine gute Präsenz bei der Arbeit.

example: He has a bad presence in interviews.
example_german: Er hat eine schlechte Präsenz in Vorstellungsgesprächen.

example: I like to walk in the park.
example_german: Ich gehe gerne im Park spazieren.

example: I like to take a walk in the evening.
example_german: Ich gehe gerne am Abend einen Spaziergang machen.

example: I like to jump high.
I am sitting on the chair.
I am standing in the room.
I need to breathe fresh air.
The baby begins to cry loudly.
example_german: Das Baby beginnt laut zu weinen.

example: I love to smell fresh bread.
example_german: Ich liebe es, frisches Brot zu riechen.

example: I want to touch the painting.
I want to kiss my friend.
I want to embrace my family.
Students raise their hands in class.
example_german: Die Schüler heben die Hände im Unterricht.

example: She wants to raise the arms.
He decided to lift his head.
example_german: Er beschloss, den Kopf zu heben.

example: You need to lower the hands now.
example_german: Du musst jetzt die Hände senken.

example: You should never give up.
He chose to lower his head.
example_german: Er entschied sich, den Kopf zu senken.

example: He likes to move the hands.
He likes to move the arms.
He moves his head to agree.
example_german: Er bewegt den Kopf, um zuzustimmen.

example: I want to release the balloon.
Life is beautiful.
Death is a natural part of life.
example_german: Der Tod ist ein natürlicher Teil des Lebens.

example: She is pregnant with her first child.
example_german: Sie ist mit ihrem ersten Kind schwanger.

example: They are expecting a child.
She wants to be a virgin until marriage.
example_german: Sie möchte bis zur Ehe Jungfrau sein.

example: They want to make love.
They want to have sexual relations.
She needs to take the pill.
It is important to use condoms.
example_german: Es ist wichtig, Kondome zu benutzen.

example: She has her period this month.
example_german: Sie hat diesen Monat die Regel.
